headline: A Look At IBM (IBM) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum Cools
summary: International Business Machines (IBM) is back in focus as investors reassess the stock after a period of softer returns over the past month and past 3 months, alongside solid recent annual revenue and net income figures. See our latest analysis for International Business Machines. Over the past year, International Business Machines has seen short term share price pressure, with a 7 day share price return of 4.66% and 30 day share price return of 5.34%, alongside a much stronger 1 year total...
